name: Clarion UIX Gen 1 Themes
body:
### Clarion UIX
Making Clarion Apps beautiful!

### What do you get?
* Wallpapers, at several resolutions.
* Splash screens (with and without the Clarion logo).
* Icons, a lot of icons for the most common things in PNG format, ready to be implemented.
* Entry fields, several entry fields in PNG format, ready to be used on those forms to make them look beautiful.

### What do I need?
Clarion 10, you can buy a license at http://softvelocity.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
